mapper.select: SELECT i.inquiry_id, i.user_id, u.user_name, i.order_id, i.subject, i.content, i.category AS categoryCode, i.status AS statusCode, i.reply, i.created_at, i.updated_at, i.product_id, p.product_name, imgs.image_url FROM INQUIRY i JOIN USER u ON i.user_id = u.user_id LEFT JOIN PRODUCT p ON i.product_id = p.product_id LEFT JOIN INQUIRY_IMAGE imgs ON i.inquiry_id = imgs.inquiry_id ORDER BY i.created_at DESC LIMIT #{limit} OFFSET #{offset}

SELECT i.inquiry_id, i.user_id, u.user_name, i.order_id, i.subject, i.content, i.category AS categoryCode, i.status AS statusCode, i.reply, i.created_at, i.updated_at, i.product_id, p.product_name, imgs.image_url FROM INQUIRY i JOIN USER u ON i.user_id = u.user_id LEFT JOIN PRODUCT p ON i.product_id = p.product_id LEFT JOIN INQUIRY_IMAGE imgs ON i.inquiry_id = imgs.inquiry_id WHERE i.inquiry_id = #{inquiryId}
mapper.update: UPDATE INQUIRY SET status = #{status}, updated_at = NOW() WHERE inquiry_id = #{inquiryId}
UPDATE INQUIRY SET category = #{category}, updated_at = NOW() WHERE inquiry_id = #{inquiryId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO INQUIRY (user_id, order_id, subject, content, category, status, product_id, created_at) VALUES (#{userId}, #{orderId}, #{subject}, #{content}, #{categoryCode}, 1, #{productId}, NOW())
INSERT INTO INQUIRY_IMAGE (inquiry_id, image_url, image_order) VALUES (#{inquiryId}, #{imageUrl}, #{imageOrder})
